purpleculture_pinyin:
yāng
shoots; sprouts
побеги; ростки
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 央 indicates the sound; 禾 (rice) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
插秧 [ chā yāng ]: to transplant rice seedlings
秧苗 [ yāng miáo ]: seedling
拔秧 [ bá yāng ]: to pull up seedlings (for transplanting)
秧子 [ yāng zi ]: sapling; seedling; bud; baby animal
秧歌 [ yāng ge ]: Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 央 [ yāng ] central; to beg; to run out
heisig_chinese_memo: After some bright flashes of like the farmer searches his wheat field and finds an alien youngling in the center.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After some bright flashes of like the farmer searches his wheat field and finds an alien youngling in the center.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " He " and " Yang ", the original meaning is the first seedling of rice. "Shuowen": "He is like a rice seedling. From the heo, the sound is raised." Duan Yucai's note: "The seedling is called the rice seedling." Tang Gaoshi "Guangling Beie Zheng Shi": "The stream is good for fishing , Jiang Tiannai planting seedlings."

" Seedlings " can generally refer to seedlings that can be transplanted from the beginning of plants. Yuan Hao Jing "Grapes": "A few flowers are left after the seedlings are broken, and they are forced to support the soil."

" Seedlings " can also refer to certain young animals that can be raised. The Book of the Farm Garden in Huang Province of the Ming Dynasty: "Nowadays, the common people buy fish seedlings. The fishermen use the tide to take them out of the river. At first they are like needles, but when they are bigger, they are raised in ponds.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " He " and " Yang ", the original meaning is the primary seedling of rice.
humanum_full_description:
從「禾」，「央」聲，本義為稻的初生幼苗。《說文》：「禾若秧穰也。从禾，央聲。」 段玉裁注：「秧，今俗謂稻之初生者曰秧。」唐高適〈廣陵別鄭處士〉：「溪水堪垂釣，江田耐插秧。」

　　「秧」可泛指草木初生可以移植的幼苗。元郝經〈葡萄〉：「斷秧餘幾花，強勉著土擁。」

　　「秧」也可指某些可飼養的幼小動物。明黃省曾《農圃書》：「今俗購魚秧，漁人泛大江乘潮而布網取之，初如針鋒然，稍大則鬻魚池養之家。」
humanum_short_description: 從「禾」，「央」聲，本義為稻的初生幼苗。

從「 禾 」，「 央 」聲，本義為稻的初生幼苗。《說文》：「禾若秧穰也。从禾，央聲。」 段玉裁注：「秧，今俗謂稻之初生者曰秧。」唐高適〈廣陵別鄭處士〉：「溪水堪垂釣，江田耐插秧。」 「 秧 」可泛指草木初生可以移植的幼苗。元郝經〈葡萄〉：「斷秧餘幾花，強勉著土擁。」 「 秧 」也可指某些可飼養的幼小動物。明黃省曾《農圃書》：「今俗購魚秧，漁人泛大江乘潮而布網取之，初如針鋒然，稍大則鬻魚池養之家。」
From the sound of " He" and " Yang", the original meaning is the first seedling of rice. "Shuowen": "He is like a rice seedling. From the heo, the sound is raised." Duan Yucai's note: "The seedling is called the rice seedling." Tang Gaoshi "Guangling Beie Zheng Shi": "The stream is good for fishing , Jiang Tiannai planting seedlings." " Seedlings" can generally refer to seedlings that can be transplanted from the beginning of plants. Yuan Hao Jing "Grapes": "A few flowers are left after the seedlings are broken, and they are forced to support the soil." " Seedlings" can also refer to certain young animals that can be raised. The Book of the Farm Garden in Huang Province of the Ming Dynasty: "Nowadays, the common people buy fish seedlings. The fishermen use the tide to take them out of the river. At first they are like needles, but when they are bigger, they are raised in ponds.

秧字的基本解释

秧
yāng
植物的幼苗：秧苗。树秧儿。秧田。育秧。插秧（特指稻苗）。
某些植物的茎：瓜秧。拉秧。
某些初生的小动物：鱼秧子。
栽植；畜养：秧几棵树。他秧了一池鱼。

秧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yāng］
［《廣韻》於良切，平陽，影。］
［《廣韻》於兩切，上養，影。］
(1)稻的初生幼苗。
(2)泛指草木初生可以移植的幼苗。如桑秧、松秧。
(3)某些可饲养的幼小动物。
(4)栽种，培育。参见“秧稻”。
(5)姓。见清严如熤《苗防备览》卷十八。

秧字的英文翻译

◎ 秧
fry, rice seedling, seedling, young

秧字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　秧； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页851第32
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於良切，音央。禾苗。【正字通】苗始生，尚稺，分科植之，非秧卽栽禾也。【韻會】蒔謂之秧。【集韻】訓栽，?非。　又【廣韻】於兩切【集韻】倚兩切，?音鞅。秧穰，禾密貌。

秧字的源字形

秧字的起名意思

：指植物的幼苗或某些植物的茎。

seedling
Basic explanation of words
seedling
yāng
Plant seedlings: seedlings. Tree seedlings. Seedling field. Nurturing seedlings. Planting seedlings (especially rice seedlings).
Stems of certain plants: melon seedlings. Pull seedlings.
Some newborn small animals: fish seedlings.
Planting; Livestock: Seedling a few trees. He raised a pond of fish.
seedling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yāng］
["Guangyun" Yu Liangqie, Pingyang, Shadow. ]
["Guang Yun" in two cuts, upper support, shadow. ]
(1) Primary seedlings of rice.
(2) Generally refers to the seedlings that can be transplanted at the beginning of the plant. Such as mulberry seedlings and pine seedlings.
(3) Certain young animals that can be raised.
(4) Plant and cultivate. See "Rice Rice".
(5) Last name. See Qingyan Ruzhen's "Miao Defense Preparation" Volume 18.

fry, rice seedling, seedling, young

: Refers to the seedlings of plants or the stems of certain plants.

Пиктофонетические символы.
Он имеет в виду, что саженцы - это саженцы Хэ; Ян (ян) означает звук, а в середине есть среднее значение, что означает, что посадка осенью должна быть вертикальной, а не перекошенной.
Первоначальное значение - Хэ Мяо.
①Саженцы растений: деревья ~ ”Уход ~. 2 Саженцы риса: вставка ~. ③Стебли некоторых растений: ~ семена | бобы ~ | дыни ~. ④Некоторые новорожденные животные: рыба ~ | свиньи ~. ⑤ Выращивание; животноводство: ~ курица | ~ несколько деревьев | ~ пруд с рыбками.
~ Песня ~ Foot ~ Возраст ~ Рассада ~ Полевой рис ~ Цветок ~ Посадка ~

yāng
I сущ.
1) рисовая рассада
插秧 высаживать рассаду риса
2) всход, росток; саженец, рассада
菜秧 капустная рассада
树秧 саженец
3) побег, усик (у растений)
豆秧 усик гороха
4) детёныш, молодая особь
鱼秧 малёк рыбы

сажать, высаживать; выращивать
